title: Substitue Coordinate Values
text: Substitute values into the exponential model equation $$f(x)={ab}^x$$ for each coordinate.

title: Rewrite
text: Rewrite the equation $$6={ab}^{\left(-2\right)}$$ so that variable a is isolated

so that variable a is isolated

title: Substitute Equation
